Name: Stop and Think
Description: Draw one card from your deck.

Name: Swim Under
Description: Deal 2 damage directly to the encounter deck as if there were no enemies on the field.

Name: Strike Precisely
Description: Deal 2 damage to one enemy. If you have three or more cards in your hand, deal 4 damage instead.

Name: Snap
Description:
Deal 2 damage to one enemy.
Draw one card from your deck.

Name: Overpower
Description: Deal 6 damage to one enemy. If you are dealing more damage than the amount of health they have remaining, deal the excess damage directly to the encounter deck as if there were no enemies on the field.
